text: Paris Nanterre University is a public research university in Nanterre, Hauts- de-Seine, France. It is in the Paris metropolitan area. It is one of the most well known French universities. They are known for their law, humanities, political science, social and natural sciences and economics courses. It is one of the thirteen successor universities of the University of Paris.. ==References== Category:Universities in Paris Category:Hauts-de-Seine
title: Paris Nanterre University
